author: cnbc.com
title: Mueller Water Products Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
ATLANTA, April 17, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mueller Water Products, Inc. (NYSE:MWA) announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of five cents ($0.05) per share, payable on or about May 21, 2018 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on May 10, 2018.
About Mueller Water Products
Mueller Water Products, Inc. (NYSE:MWA) is a leading manufacturer and marketer of products and services used in the transmission, distribution and measurement of water in North America. Our broad product and service portfolio includes engineered valves, fire hydrants, metering products and systems, leak detection and pipe condition assessment. We help municipalities increase operational efficiencies, improve customer service and prioritize capital spending, demonstrating why Mueller Water Products is Where Intelligence Meets InfrastructureÂ®. For more information about Mueller Water Products, visit www.muellerwaterproducts.com .
